column5: A classic CBC interview...  http://podcast.cbc.ca/mp3/listenerschoice_20091120_23368.mp3  Watch out for them beavers...
Link won't open for me - anyone else having problems?  Don

Interesting how the damn Beaver got up on the bridge in the first place..I feel for the dude thou..I have had to beat the beaver off of me with a wrench too!!! Now thats funny! On a more serious note. I was once fishing in the Grand River here in Brantford. I was wearing my waiters and standing in about 3 to 4 foot of water. A white jig head with a white mr.Twister catchin pickerell. all of a sudden I look right beside me and there is this huge big thing swimming upstream about 4 to 5 inches from my leg..It scared the hell outta me. Yikes! as it turned out it was a beaver when I jumped it scared him too and the big dude soaked me..Not somthing your used to seeing right beside ya! wow

Beavers, allthough very interesting to observe, are often a big nuissance in many townships. Flooding roads, taking out power lines etc.  If it were not for trappers and animal damage control professionals, they would become overpopulated in no time.
